meanings.definition: A desk where copy is edited and prepared for publication.
meanings.sent1: The copydesks in the office are always busy with editing articles.
meanings.sent2: The copydesks at the newspaper office ensure that all articles are error-free before printing.
meanings.sent3: The copydesks had a party after successfully editing the latest issue of the magazine.
meanings.sent4: The copydesks were like diligent guardians, ensuring the text was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the copydesks made them stand out in the busy newsroom.

meanings.definition: The department responsible for editing and preparing copy for publication.
meanings.sent1: The copydesks work closely with writers to refine their articles.
meanings.sent2: In the publishing house, the copydesks play a crucial role in ensuring quality content.
meanings.sent3: The copydesks organized a workshop to improve editing skills among staff.
meanings.sent4: The copydesks were the heart of the editorial team, ensuring coherence in all publications.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of the copydesks streamlined the publication process for the magazine.
